column4: Tourism;Preah Sihanouk Province: Oknha Tea Vichet sent 3 speed boats to rescue a tourist boat that got into difficulties off Snake Island (Koh Puos) And Disk Island (Koh Thas). There were ten people on board
column5: including eight Chinese passengers and two crew
column6: who were rescued and taken back to land.------According to the driver of the boat
column7: heavy rain and wind caused high waves that damaged the engine and swamped the boat.------He immediately contacted Oknha Vichet
column8: who sent the boats to the rescue.------SOURCE: HUY BUNLENG
